name: Supplication
description: A person in distress appeals to another for help or mercy
examples: Antigone pleading for burial rights, Oliver Twist asking for more food

desperation.name: Desperation
desperation.description: The supplicant faces a dire situation requiring outside help

approach.name: The Approach
approach.description: The supplicant seeks out the person who has the power to help

supplication.name: The Supplication
supplication.description: The formal request for help is made

consideration.name: Consideration
consideration.description: The powerful person weighs the request and its implications

response.name: Response
response.description: The answer is given - help granted, denied, or conditional

aftermath.name: Aftermath
aftermath.description: The results of the supplication play out
